title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 April 2016 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius\_> has quit  
01:35 <Chuguniy> has quit  
04:09 <gene> has quit  
05:09 <phancox> has joined #xwiki  
05:11 <phancox> @vmassol I've spun up a fresh Windows 10 vm and installed latest Chrom 64-bit and it exhibits the menu refresh issue also  
05:13 <phancox> It seems that when the cog is presses Chrome does a screen refresh and the menu disappears when that completes  
05:13 <phancox> Browsers such as Firefox don't do a screen refresh  
06:23 <gene> has joined #xwiki  
07:18 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <phancox> has quit  
09:03 <phancox> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <phancox> @vmassol I've spun up a fresh Windows 10 VM and installed latest Chrome at it still exhibits the same problem with the cog and vertical elipses icons in the menu bar  
09:06 <phancox> @vmassol: Sorry it's been a while and I've forgotten how to use IRC  
09:07 <phancox> @vmassol: Chrome, unlike Firefox & IE) does a screen refresh when the cog is selected and consequently the menu popup disappears when the refresh completes  
09:19 <vmassol> phancox: thanks, seen your message  
09:23 <phancox> @vmassol: Also left a message on the dev list  
09:24 <phancox> @vmassol: Going to be away for a few hours but back later if you want any more details  
11:38 <ekarlso> has quit  
13:25 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
14:20 <Chuguniy> has joined #xwiki  
14:30 <mflorea> has quit  
15:48 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
15:55 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
22:23 <vmassol> has quit
